title: An Act to modify the rules for taking depositions outside the Commonwealth and to adopt the uniform interstate depositions and discovery act

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Day of Stoneham, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1646) of Michael S. Day for legislation to modify the rules for taking depositions outside the Commonwealth and to adopt the uniform interstate depositions and discovery act.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
Hearing scheduled for 11/04/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1
